power.title: Aggressive Familiar
power.fluff: As you use an arcane power, your familiar explodes, damaging creatures you hit

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: Your familiar must be in its active state

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Your familiar is destroyed, and you gain a +5 power bonus to damage rolls against creatures that were adjacent to your familiar. The bonus lasts until the end of the current turn.

section.name: Source Feat:
section.text: Aggressive Familiar

power.title: Argent Falcon
power.fluff: Your familiar briefly transforms into a silver falcon, and shines with pure moonlight

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, your familiar sheds bright light in its space and each square within 3 squares of it. Enemies within the light grant combat advantage.

section.name: Source Feat:
section.text: Argent Falcon

power.title: Balm of the Cultivator
power.fluff: Your enemy's attack releases healing energy within you, which you use to aid your friend

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy damages you with an attack

section.name: Target:
section.text: One ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

section.name: Source Feat:
section.text: Aspect of the Cultivator

power.title: Battle Trample
power.fluff: You incite your mount to stamp, read, and kick unpredictably, with any foe that remains too close taking damage and being driven back

section.name: Target:
section.text: A mount you are riding and that has a trample power

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the start of your next turn, any enemy that ends its turn adjacent to the target takes 3 damage, and is pushed 1 square from the target. The effect ends if you are no longer riding the target.

section.name: Mount Level 11:
section.text: 6 damage.

section.name: Mount Level 21:
section.text: 9 damage, and pushed 2 squares.

section.name: Source Feat:
section.text: Battle Trample

power.title: Binding Bola
power.fluff: The weights entwine the cords around your target, wrapping it so tightly that it cannot maintain its momentum

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a bola

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: The target is also knocked prone.

section.name: Level 17:
section.text: If you know this power as an encounter attack power of 17th level or higher, the damage increases to 4[W] + Dexterity.

section.name: Source Feat:
section.text: Bola Training

power.title: Bloodied Regeneration
power.fluff: Your wounds call to your immortal blood, which surges to repair your body

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be bloodied

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you gain regeneration 5 while you are bloodied.
Your regeneration is suppressed for 1 round if you take radiant damage, take damage from a silver weapon, or are in direct sunlight.

section.name: Source Feat:
section.text: Bloodied Regeneration

power.title: Bog Hunter's Poison
power.fluff: You carefully apply to a weapon a poison that you extracted from local flora and fauna during a rest

section.name: Target:
section.text: One weapon

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The next attack with the weapon that hits before the end of the encounter deals an extra ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).

section.name: Each failed saving throw:
section.text: The ongoing damage increases by 5, to a maximum of 15.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: The initial ongoing damage increases to 10, and the maximum to 25.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: The initial ongoing damage increases to 15, and the maximum to 35.

section.name: Source Feat:
section.text: Bogtangle Heritage

power.title: Bogtangle Dart
power.fluff: An enemy struck by your dart feels a spreading numbness as the venom does its work

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a blowgun

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity or Wisdom vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] poison damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
If the target is already slowed, it becomes immobilized until the end of your next turn instead.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2[W] poison damage.

section.name: Source Feat:
section.text: Bogtangle Warrior

power.title: Bola Recovery
power.fluff: With the bola back in hand, you ready it for another precise throw

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must know the binding bola power

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a bola

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You regain the use of your binding bola power.

power.title: Crippling Needle
power.fluff: Your needle lodges in a key pressure point, causing your target to stiffen and momentarily fail to act

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a blowgun

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is stunned until the end of its next turn.

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: The target is dazed (save ends).

section.name: Level 25:
section.text: If you know this power as a daily attack power of 25th level or higher, the damage increases to 5[W] + Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).

section.name: Source Feat:
section.text: Blowgun Training

power.title: Fury of the Elements
power.fluff: You channel elemental power used against you and unleash its fury against your foes

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You take cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You take half damage from the triggering attack, and this power has the keyword or keywords for the triggering attack's damage type or types.
Your first attack before the end of your next turn deals 1d6 extra damage of the type or types dealt by the triggering attack.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2d6 extra damage.

section.name: Source Feat:
section.text: Aspect of the Elements

power.title: Initiate's Warding
power.fluff: You have studied the warding techniques of swordmages, but cannot reach the reliability expected of them

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a light blade or a heavy blade

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +1 bonus to AC, or a +3 bonus to AC if one hand is free.
You lose the bonus if you are no longer wielding a light blade or heavy blade, and regain it when you again wield one. The effect immediately ends if you fall unconscious.

section.name: Source Feat:
section.text: Blade Initiate

power.title: Stinging Shot
power.fluff: The needle lodges in a sensitive area, jolting your prey with pain

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a blowgun

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Level 17:
section.text: If you know this power as an encounter attack power of level 17 or higher, the damage increases to 4[W] + Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Source Feat:
section.text: Blowgun Training

power.title: Uncanny Blowgun Aim
power.fluff: You breathe precisely, taking in your target and carefully lining up the needle's trajectory

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Your next attack with a blowgun gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll. If the attack imparts an effect that a save can end, the target takes a -3 penalty to its first saving throw against it.

section.name: Source Feat:
section.text: Blowgun Training
